text:
e="preserve">"Big Dreams & High Hopes" is the fifth studio album by Jack Ingram. The album was released on August 25, 2009. It was his first new material in 2 years. It was produced by Big Machine Records. It debuted at #21 on Billboard's Top Country Albums Chart.
Critical reception.
Allmusic reviewer Thom Jurek gave the album three-and-a-half stars out of five. He wrote "Big Dreams & High Hopes" is the sound of contemporary country music and all of its tropes." He also said that most of the songs were well-written but not distinctive.
